entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm.
